enhanced_description: 4Gives provides secured lending services and flexible payment solutions, enabling employers to offer financial assistance, credit, and loans to their employees for personal or emergency needs. This service is provided at no direct cost to the employer and allows employees to shop from a wide range of physical or online stores. The solution aims to improve employee happiness, engagement, and overall well-being by addressing their financial needs.

Enabling employees to shop at thousands of physical or online stores using provided funds/credit
